note.p: Career: Died after the bomber he was travelling in was forced to make an emergency landing, near Musgrave
Medals/Prizes: Nobel Prize (Physiology or Medicine) (jointly with Macleod) 1923
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 21-26, plate, by C H Best
References: A F Bristow, T Barrowcliffe and D R Bangham, 'Standardization of biological medicines: the first hundred years, 1900-2000' in NR 2006 vol 60 pp 271-289
